items.title: Safari Industries – Why the stock is a good addition in a volatile market
items.description: Diverse product offerings, channel mix, and frugal approach to cost augur well for the company

items.title: Agro Tech Foods to acquire Bharti JV Del Monte Foods for Rs 1,300 crore; stock falls
items.description: Agro Tech's proposed acquisition of Bharti Enterprises' stake in Del Monte Foods is structured as a preferential allotment. The deal will make Del Monte Foods a wholly-owned subsidiary of Agro Tech.

items.title: Eicher Q2 numbers muted, premium segment to continue doing well
items.description: Second half likely to be better supported by a host of factors

items.title: Will the robust BSE Q2 earnings translate into further stock upside?
Agro Tech Foods to acquire Del Monte Foods for Rs 1,300 crore share swap
items.description: Bharti Enterprises will become the second largest shareholder in Agro Tech Foods, with nearly 21 percent stake, after the share swap. Agro Tech Foods will acquire an exclusive, perpetual license for the Del Monte brand in India.

items.title: IBC’s section on protecting creditors from fraudulent applications is anomalous
items.description: If Parliament actually intended to prevent one creditor from filing an application with an intent to defraud other creditors, then a new sub-section has to be added which clearly stipulates the consequences of such an application. Parliament has to step in to rectify the error which persists
